advantage.name: Core Advantages
advantage.description: Empowering enterprise digital transformation through innovative technology to ensure software quality.

workflow.name: Full Lifecycle Support
workflow.description: Comprehensive solution spanning the entire software development and testing lifecycle.

function.name: Product Modules
function.description: Drives standardized, efficient team collaboration through integrated advanced technology and automated processes, significantly improving R&D and testing efficiency.

feature.name: Product Features
feature.description: Meets diverse user needs, enhances market competitiveness and customer retention, ultimately driving 300% business value growth.

items.detail: Predefined templates for Agile, General, and Test Project Management.
Task-based management for requirements, stories, bugs, and all testing activities.
30% faster than JMeter with million-level concurrency and 10M QPS support.
Distributed testing across regions with hundreds of load nodes.
Automated test case, script, and configuration generation.
AI assistant for knowledge queries, test case creation, and scripting.
Plugin updates without app upgrades. Enhanced customization and scalability.
Simplified scripting with YAML/JSON specifications instead of Python/C.
Multi-step scenario design replaces manual scripting.
End-to-end API lifecycle management: design to code generation.
Import APIs from Swagger, OpenAPI, and Postman formats.
Rapid API simulation for parallel development/testing. Prevents production issues.
Realistic test data generation for system testing and demos.
Configurable metrics for business efficiency and testing performance.
Quantify team performance. Identify improvements and enhance goals.
Multi-tenant with RESTful APIs for CI system integration.
Team sharing of scripts, scenarios, APIs, and reports.
16+ templates and professional reports for all testing types.
Extended identity management with LDAP/AD and OAuth2 SSO.
HTTPS security, data-level permissions, and PBAC access control.

brand.name: AngusTester
brand.description: A professional R&D and testing platform that provides teams with efficient integrated solutions to help improve software quality and delivery speed.

contact.text: Room 1016, 10th Floor, Building 3A, 186 Litang Road, Changping District, Beijing

footer.ICP: ICP No. 2021037962-1 Beijing Public Network Security No. 11011402012129

banner.title: Designed for IT Companies, Free for Teams Under 20
banner.description: Discover the powerful features of AngusTester including planning, tracking, collaboration, and testing. Register now for a free trial and experience how to enhance team efficiency and project management!

features.title: Project Management & Workflow
description: Central unit for managing tasks, tests, requirements, workflows, and resources – simplifying project oversight.

1. Add Projects
Establish basic workflow units for managing R&D and testing activities.
2. Sprint and Test Plans
Define responsibilities, timelines, objectives, and acceptance criteria for R&D and testing activities.
3. Execute R&D and Testing Activities
Execute plans while tracking key items: tasks, defects, requirements, user stories, tests.
4. Report Results
Capture key R&D/testing insights: progress, performance, data, results for project delivery.

features.title: Task Collaboration
description: Rich features and diverse task views enable intuitive collaboration, mentions, comments, and notes within and between teams.

Capabilities:
Organize project activities and scheduling through "Sprint".
Clearly assign responsibilities for task assignment, confirmation, and collaboration.
Report and analyze project health, progress status, and issue trends.

features.title: Functional Testing
description: Functional testing management module that establishes review mechanisms and verifies software systems against specifications and user requirements.

Capabilities:
Organize testers through "Plans" for functional testing activities.
Conduct use case reviews to identify potential defects and errors early.
Report and analyze project health, progress status, and issue trends.

features.title: API Testing
description: API management module that helps developers and testers easily add, test, debug, and document APIs, enabling companies to achieve API assetization.

Capabilities:
Online editing and debugging of interfaces.
Manage projects, services, interfaces, and test tasks.
Conduct functional, performance, and stability testing of APIs to ensure delivery of stable systems that meet performance indicators.

features.title: Scenario Testing
description: Scenario management module helps orchestrate complex requirements or user stories. Compared to single-step test cases, scenarios can include multiple steps and workflows.

Capabilities:
Online editing and debugging of scenarios.
Quickly generate scenario test scripts and tasks.
Monitor business scenario operations and trigger notifications or alerts.

features.title: Service Mock
description: Quickly generate and simulate APIs you depend on, allowing development and testing to proceed faster. Enables comprehensive testing and earlier delivery of stable products/applications. Avoids dirty data issues from direct integration testing with production systems.

Capabilities:
1. Simulate HTTP responses based on request paths, methods, and parameters.
2. Support custom response formats and HTTP status codes.
3. Simulate callback scenarios with support for async/sync callbacks.
4. Simulate network latency and server processing times.
5. Generate dynamic data using mock functions.
6. Simulate error responses to test client error handling logic.

features.title: Kanban (Big Screen)
description: Data assets and performance dashboards help teams and management monitor, analyze, and optimize project progress and quality.

Data Asset Board:
Centralized display of project data assets like tasks, test cases, defect reports, APIs, scripts, and reports.

Performance Board:
Real-time project KPIs including workload, task count, efficiency, defect rate, and overdue items.

features.title: Analysis & Reporting
description: Comprehensive summaries of R&D and testing activities including progress, efficiency, quality, implementation status, and result analysis.
Supports 5 report types: Project Report, R&D Task Report, Functional Test Report, API Test Report, and Execution Report.

footer.title: Experience a Free R&D Testing Platform Designed for Small Teams

business.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback.

banner.title: Integration of Artificial Intelligence with Software R&D Testing Scenarios
banner.description: Utilize advanced AI technology to optimize R&D and testing processes, enhance team collaboration and productivity, ensuring your projects maintain a leading position in the competitive market!

features.title: Knowledge Intelligence Assistant
description: The AngusTester Knowledge Intelligence Assistant is the smart partner for R&D teams, capable of quickly acquiring and organizing project-related knowledge, providing real-time suggestions, and solving technical challenges.
Whether for technical issues or project management, the AI assistant delivers precise support, helping teams iterate rapidly and improve decision-making efficiency by over 30%.

features.title: Intelligent Product Backlog Generation
description: AngusTester uses AI to intelligently analyze requirements and automatically generate detailed product backlog items, ensuring teams always focus on high-priority tasks.
Eliminate tedious manual input - the system automatically organizes tasks, prioritizes work, and optimizes collaboration processes, freeing up over 30% of management time.

features.title: Intelligent R&D Task Decomposition
description: AngusTester uses intelligent algorithms to automatically decompose feature requirements into detailed R&D task lists, clearly defining team responsibilities.
Whether for large projects or small feature development, the system efficiently breaks down tasks, improving work efficiency by 40% and reducing communication costs.

features.title: Automated Functional Test Case Generation
description: AngusTester automatically generates comprehensive test cases based on functional requirements, ensuring each feature undergoes rigorous validation and increasing test coverage by 30%.
AI-driven test generation reduces human error, providing higher stability and reliability before product release, while decreasing defect rates by 40%.

features.title: Automated API Test Scripting
description: AngusTester intelligently analyzes API documentation and business logic to automatically generate interface test scripts, ensuring seamless system integration.
Supports various interface types including RESTful API and GraphQL, improving testing efficiency by 50% and ensuring reliable system operation.
